alert.note: Alert for Ada; Canyon; Owyhee (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 06 at 9:02PM MDT until June 06 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northwestern Ada County in southwestern Idaho... Southeastern Canyon County in southwestern Idaho... Northwestern Owyhee County in southwestern Idaho... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 902 PM MDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Boise to near Initial Point to near Reynolds, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * Interstate 84 and US Highway 20 will be affected. This wall of dust will be near... Boise and Kuna around 910 PM MDT. Garden City around 920 PM MDT. Meridian and Lake Lowell around 930 PM MDT. Nampa and Eagle around 940 PM MDT. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
